item.title: Google Coordinator - Mountain View
item.description: The successful candidate will be responsible for providing excellent service to our merchants, while simultaneously helping the product run smoothly behind the scenes. This person should be proactive, organized, extremely detail-oriented, and should work well within a group.
item.g:label: Coordinator
Google
Online Support
item.g:location: 1600 Amphitheatre Parkway, Mountain View, CA, 94043, USA

item.title: Google T-Shirt Distributor
item.description: Love T-shirts? Just can't get enough? Why not consider a career as an official Google T-shirt Distributor. You will have first dibs on all new t-shirts, and you'll get the satisfaction of giving each Googler ONE t-shirt each.
item.g:label: Distributor
T-Shirts
Google
item.g:location: 1600 Amphitheatre Parkway, Mountain View, CA, 94043, USA
